**0.0.10**

* Add .ini files checker

**0.0.9**

* By default mccabe max-complexity=12

**0.0.8**

* Add frosted checker

**0.0.7**

* By default pep8 ignores E226

**0.0.6**

* By default mccabe plugin is enabled
  (max-complexity=10)

**0.0.5**

* Add README.rst to MANIFEST.in

**0.0.4**

* Add default pep8-naming checker

**0.0.3**


* Add *.yaml files checker


**0.0.2**


* Add .rst files checker


**0.0.1**


* Initial release
